website_summaries.verdict: A respected and effective test prep book designed for high school students who are trying to get a 5 on their AP Computer Science A exam.
pros: This test prep guide features a diagnostic test to help students identify their strengths and weaknesses
The 8th edition includes 2 full-length practice tests in the book and access to 3 more full-length tests online
cons: This book assumes the reader has a firm foundation in the basic principles of computer science
It's written to expand upon your knowledge, not start you off at square one

customer_reviews.title: Good for test & reference
customer_reviews.text: Read the book a week or so before the test. Didn’t take the high school class. Got a 4.
customer_reviews.author: richardb

customer_reviews.title: Recommended study guide for AP Computer Science - user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Recommended study guide for AP Computer Science - user friendly, larger book than other guides but helped my son get a "5"...
customer_reviews.author: senior OT

customer_reviews.title: Bad for beginners
customer_reviews.text: If you're planning to self-study this as a sophomore in High School, like I am, and have no previous coding experience, this book is extremely hard to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Paras Sakharkar

customer_reviews.title: Updated to reflect the latest in the APCS exam
customer_reviews.text: The gold standard for preparing for the APCS exam. Very comprehensive.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: This is the true AP study guide
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for any A.P. student or teacher hoping to prepare for the A.P. Computer Science A exam this year! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W. Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: If anyone is preparing for AP, should definitely consider the book. I comes with multiple questions and test. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J Park

customer_reviews.title: a very useful book
customer_reviews.text: My son said it is a good book. It helps him better than some website he found out before.
customer_reviews.author: Larry W.

customer_reviews.title: WARNING---------- The Book has errors
customer_reviews.text: Some answers to the practice questions in the book are wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good practice questions
customer_reviews.text: This book was useful for studying in my college intermediate java course. It has good practice questions and explains concepts well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prepared me well!
customer_reviews.text: My teacher used this book to prepare us for the AP Computer Science A exam. The questions are exactly like what you will see on the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: We love Barron’s and Princeton review! Buy both!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it and felt much more confident with his AP exam!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The book explains the contents pretty clearly, but at least half of the practice ...
customer_reviews.text: The book explains the contents pretty clearly, but at least half of the practice questions are undoable. Not only are they much harder than the real test, they are usually phrased in a bad manner or provide too little background for one to answer. Some of them are just pure bias based on one's personal coding preference. Would recommend if you are challenged by the content, but don't count it as a good source of practice.
customer_reviews.author: WQ

customer_reviews.title: Poorly written test questions and practice tests as as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Poorly written test questions and practice tests as as a whole. Consider this book only if you're looking for review, not practice.
customer_reviews.author: Luc Corriveau

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: It is a good book and helps With the AP test however don’t use just this book
customer_reviews.author: munish

customer_reviews.title: Really helped
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the study guides available, I found this one the most helpful.
customer_reviews.author: lm8888

customer_reviews.title: Excellent prep book
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, and it has great prep materials.
customer_reviews.author: Debabrata Sarkar

customer_reviews.title: Good book, use a week before the test for a 5!
customer_reviews.text: The Book is extensive and highly detailed. Chapters seems to follow core concepts.
customer_reviews.author: Selokar

customer_reviews.title: Useful algorithmic thinking
customer_reviews.text: Even if you are not good at coding or interested in coding careers and video games design, like skill in speaking foreign languages of wealthier foreign countries active in business enterprises, the skill gives one an edge over those without coding skills. A must have skill.
customer_reviews.author: Sizing alert

product_meta.title: Barron's AP Computer Science A, 8th Edition: with Bonus Online Tests
